src_original: 57.21cd/ madhye tu sapta vipulā pariṇāhāt triguṇitāḥ sapta//  57.22ab/ aṣṭau tu jānumadhye vaipulyaṃ try^aṣṭakaṃ tu pariṇāhaḥ/  57.24cd/ stanayoḥ ṣoḍaśa ca^antaram ūrdhvaṃ kakṣye[K.kakṣe] ṣaḍ^aṅgulike//  57.25ab/ *aṣṭāv aṃsau dvādaśa bāhū kāryau[K.kāryāv aṣṭāv aṃsau dvādaśa bāhū] tathā prabāhū ca/  57.25cd/ bāhū ṣaḍ^vistīrṇau[K.ṣaḍvistirṇau] pratibāhū tv aṅgula^catuṣkam//
57.26ab/ ṣoḍaśa bāhū mūle pariṇāhād dvādaśa^agra^haste ca/
57.27ab/ pañca^aṅgulāni madhyā pradeśinī madhya^parva^dala^hīnā/  57.27cd/ anayā tulyā ca^anāmikā kaniṣṭhā tu parva^ūnā//
tgt_original: madhyāṅgulī pañcamātrā |  tasyāḥ parvārddhonā pradeśinī |  anāmikā tatsamā |  parvonā kanīyasī |  sarvāṅgulyastriparvāḥ |  stananābhyormadhyaṃ ṣoḍaśāṅgulam |
